name: John Lemon's Haunted Jaunt (ErickAraujo)
description:
Projeto feito no curso Unity3D Learn, 

https://learn.unity.com/project/john-lemon-s-haunted-jaunt-3d-beginner

Ajude Lemon a escapar da casa mal assombrada, e não seja pego pelos guardas fantasmas!

English Version:

Project made in the Unity3D Learn course,

  https://learn.unity.com/project/john-lemon-s-haunted-jaunt-3d-beginner

Help Lemon escape from the haunted house, and don't get caught by the ghost guards!
